sentences.en: Andre Agassi has pulled out of next week's Grand Slam Cup after tearing a cartilage in his chest.
sentences.cn: 安德烈·阿加西胸部软骨拉伤后已退出了下周的大满贯赛事。

sentences.en: Another type of cell called a chondroblast forms new cartilage.
sentences.cn: 名叫软骨原细胞的另一种细胞会形成新的软骨.

sentences.en: As a result, the infernal circle finally lead to articular cartilage cataplasia.
sentences.cn: 以至形成恶性循环, 最终导致关节软骨退变.

sentences.en: Cartilage's surface is usually resilient and smooth.
sentences.cn: 软骨表面通常是有弹性而且平滑的.

sentences.en: Connective tissues, joint fluid, and cartilage contain two - component polysaccharides, including heparin.
sentences.cn: 连接组织 、 连接流质和软骨中便含有二元多醣, 包括肝素.

sentences.en: Cracks will occur in the region of the thyroid cartilage because of deglutition.
sentences.cn: 甲状软骨部分会由于吞咽动作而龟裂.

sentences.en: Creates strong links with other molecules in the joint cartilage.
sentences.cn: 建立强有力的联系与其他分子的关节软骨.

sentences.en: Figure 9 - 1 : Degenerated articular cartilage and torn meniscus of the knee.
sentences.cn: 图9-1:膝关节退化的软骨和撕裂的半月板.

sentences.en: How is cartilage of leg knee joint degrades caused?
sentences.cn: 腿膝盖关节软骨退化是怎么引起的?

sentences.en: It was an easy shot now and he felt the cartilage sever.
sentences.cn: 这时扎起来很容易,他感到它的软骨折断了.

sentences.en: Severe pathological changes can be seen in synovial tissues, cartilage and bone.
sentences.cn: 同时,滑膜组织炎症加重, 软骨损伤及骨的破坏均更为严重.

sentences.en: The cartilage in John's nose was broken when it hit.
sentences.cn: 约翰鼻子里面的软骨在受到撞击后断了.

sentences.en: The cartilage in such areas is almost inextensible.
sentences.cn: 这些部位的软骨几乎一点儿也不能伸展.

sentences.en: The chondrocytes cultured in VICRYL can ground substance of cartilage.
sentences.cn: 在VICRYL上培养的软骨细胞能分泌软骨基质.

sentences.en: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.cn: 软骨膜是向软骨输送血液的.

trans.tran_en: a strong substance that can bend, which is around the joints in your body and in your outer ear
